section.para: The HTML Filter Site Maven plugin filters HTML files destined for site documentation in two ways:

listitem.para: Tidy - It can run JTidy on them to clean them up and make them XHTML compatible.
Filter - It can run them through a Velocity filter to provide the appearance of a Doxia-generated file without Doxia's habit of stripping useful formatting.

section.para: The HTML Filter Site plugin has two goals:

listitem.para: htmlfilter-site:filter runs Velocity on all files in a directory matching a pattern.
htmlfilter-site:tidy runs JTidy on all files in a directory matching a pattern.

section.para: Information on using the HTML Filter Site plugin can be found on the usage page.
